name: telco-adb-automation
description: ADB Framework Telco Automation Desktop Application
author: F2G Telco

scripts.electron: npm --prefix src/electron install && npm --prefix src/electron run electron
scripts.electron:dev: npm --prefix src/electron install && npm --prefix src/electron run electron:dev
scripts.build:electron: npm --prefix src/electron install && npm --prefix src/electron run build
scripts.dist:electron: npm --prefix src/electron install && npm --prefix src/electron run dist
